component.name: Switcher control
component.summary: Control application for Blackmagic Design ATEM video switchers

description.p: Switcher is a re-implementation of the Switcher Control application from Blackmagic Design for controlling the ATEM video mixers/switchers like the popular Atem Mini.

description.p: Drop the external hexdump dependency and move hexdump.py into pyatem since this library is unmaintained and the source repository is gone.

This release has support for the audio mixer in the atem and fairlight audio mixers. The connection system has also been reworked to be able to connect to USB devices in an easier way and support connecting to an openswitcher proxy daemon.

description.p: This is the first release that has support for USB access to the new ATEM mini line of switchers. It's tested on the Atem Mini and Atem Mini Pro, for other devices the usb pid/vid pair needs to be added.

This release adds support for multiple M/E blocks. Some basic upstream keyer config and a visual layout editor to move DVE keys around. The plan is to also control the other positionable elements using the same layout editor.

ul.li: Basic video switching and configuration implemented
Volume and mute/afv control for switchers with fairlight audio
